title: The Magic of Lipsticks
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Waaah, a pink, a red one, and this one is.... rose? You have so many lipsticks, Mari-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yeah. When browsing through cosmetics at the store, I ended up wanting lots of different colors. I thought I’d match them with the season or my outfit, but before I knew it, they had piled up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s nice. I also wanted to buy some cute lipsticks, but there are so many colors that I don’t know which to choose.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Is that so? Hmm~, I think this light pink one suits you, Hanayo. Hey, would you like to try it on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>May I?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! You’ll know how it would look on you better if you try it before buying, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Thank you. I’ll take you up on that and try it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Sure. Then, close your eyes and face towards me, would you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh!? Umm.... I can put it on myself, you know....? Besides, it’s a little embarrassing to have you do it for me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, your shy side is so cute, Hanayo, but you can leave this to me. Mari will cast a magic spell on you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
